summary:
With over 10 years of experience in digital marketing, social media management, content creation, and project management, I have worked with clients from a diverse range of industries, including government, entertainment, healthcare, technology, and finance.

My passion as a marketing and communications professional lies in creating unique and effective solutions that go above and beyond my clients' expectations. I use data and analytics to develop marketing strategies that are specifically tailored to your business goals, ensuring that every dollar spent is optimized for maximum ROI. With a proven track record of success, I am committed to helping businesses like yours achieve their full potential. Let's connect and explore how we can work together to make your vision a reality.

treasury_media.title: Pa Que No Te Piquen | Tere Suarez
treasury_media.description: I created Flor, a character that was part superhero and part knowledgeable spokesperson, that would deliver colorful capsules to catchy music, and, through these, instruct the audience with very dry, scientific data on how to prevent Dengue mosquito criaderos in a way that had never been done before This strategy allows for much more than just the commercials, because Flor then becomes a fairy tale version of the relatable vlogger you empathize with as you scroll daily on social media.

profile_positions.description:
brand development: brand identity development, voice, personality, language, values, achieved authenticity through consistency, strategy and analysis.

strategic consulting, including the conceptualisation of ideas and customising these for particular clients, cases, and/or campaigns. done mostly by a complete study of demographics involved and tailoring more effective campaigns.

created and ran brand ambassador programs for various clients + generated new leads by establishing relationships with bloggers, influencers, and celebrities.

crafted social media strategies that are regularly evolving, implementing changes based on weekly social media reports to maximise efforts.

content creation, and curation of all media to be used.
profile_positions.title: Creative Strategist

profile_positions.description:
analysed trends, products and demographics to estimate public reception of new campaigns.

submitted daily, weekly, and monthly social media reports for each client or product.

created and/or edited short videos, TV spots, interviews, case studies, etc.

identified the best medium for a given campaign and increase effectiveness by translating the essence of the campaign to the various new media outlets to maximise versatility and increase credibility;

best approach, language, imagery, and style to get the clients message across when focusing on a particular demographic, social movement, networks; or niche markets.
profile_positions.title: Senior Analyst + Curator Social Media Department
